attributes.action: Protect our market against products 'made in China'!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Protect our market from product made in China and other far East countries because of
- very low quality whoch causes more 
  rubbish sent to landfil.
- very low durability - they are
  designed to fail just after warranty
  period - this causes more hassle,
  unnecessary spend and pollution! 
- SAFETY!!! YES - especially electrical
  goods-seen many cases of obvious 
  danger of electric shock i.e. bare
  cores and other such faults!
- Our Jobs - if goods will be
  manufactured in the UK we will
  have more jobs!!!
